format:
An object of class
c("nfnGroupedData", "nfGroupedData", "groupedData", "data.frame")
containing the following columns:
title: Pharmacokinetics of Indomethacin
description:
Description
The Indometh data frame has 66 rows and 3 columns of data on
the pharmacokinetics of indometacin (or, older spelling,
‘indomethacin’).
reference:
Each of the six subjects were given an intravenous injection of
indometacin.

parameters.Subject:
an ordered factor with containing the subject codes.  The
ordering is according to increasing maximum response.
parameters.conc: a numeric vector of plasma concentrations of indometacin (mcg/ml).
parameters.time: a numeric vector of times at which blood samples were drawn (hr).
